provider.name: Vodafone Egypt
provider.description:
Obtains balance and other plan information on Vodafone Egypt personal account (http://www.vodafone.com.eg)
If you don't have Vodafone personal account, please register here: https://www.vodafone.com.eg/vodafoneportalWeb/en/MyVodafone_Register
provider.author: Dmitry Kochin <dco@mail.ru>
